/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the buildings that line the street. These buildings, painted in shades of gray and blue, are adorned with vibrant graffiti, adding a touch of urban artistry to the cityscape. The street itself is lined with power lines and telephone poles, a common sight in many urban areas. Cars and pedestrians can be seen going about their day, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds, providing a beautiful backdrop to the urban landscape below.
